_header: Some men speak much evil by women
_description: Richard Hatfield, a punctuation poem against women — one stanza rhyme royal

BLAdd17492.First Lines:
Sum men speke muche evyll be womentruly therfore they be to
                    blame…
BLAdd17492.Last Lines:
…in them fynd ye all constantnesthey lak pride all srewdnes as
                    I gese
